text: Hi, Quick question. How do I access aligned sequence and aligned query from the alignment(..) ?

elements.text: Hi, Quick question. How do I access aligned sequence and aligned query from the alignment(..) ?

text:
Original sequences:
```aln.a.seq
aln.b```
for query and reference, respectively. For the sequences of the alignment (e.g. with gaps, and possibly missing some parts), iterate over the alignment
